title: HoP 334 - Chance Encounters - Reviving Hellenistic philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 334 - Chance Encounters - Reviving Hellenistic philosophy
description: The rediscovery of Epicurus, Lucretius, and Sextus Empiricus spreads challenging ideas about chance, atomism, and skepticism.
